remarks: Lemma for ~ hlhilsbase2 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilslem.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilslem.e $e |- E = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilslem.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilslem.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hlhilslem.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilslem.f $e |- F = Slot N $.
hlhilslem.1 $e |- N e. NN $.
hlhilslem.2 $e |- N < 4 $.
hlhilslem.c $e |- C = ( F ` E ) $.
hlhilslem $p |- ( ph -> C = ( F ` R ) ) $.
